entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind north 30 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 6.
